title: Senior Python Engineer - AI/ML Platform
description:
We're looking for a Senior Python Engineer to join our AI/ML Platform team. You'll be building scalable data pipelines, working with FastAPI and Django, and deploying machine learning models to production.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and implement RESTful APIs using FastAPI and Django
- Build data processing pipelines with Apache Spark and Airflow
- Deploy ML models using Docker and Kubernetes
- Collaborate with data scientists to productionize machine learning workflows
- Mentor junior engineers and contribute to technical design reviews

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of professional Python development experience
- Expert-level knowledge of FastAPI, Django, or Flask
- Strong experience with AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS)
- Proficiency with Docker and Kubernetes
- Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis)
- Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and GitHub Actions
- Understanding of machine learning deployment (MLOps)

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Apache Spark, Airflow, or similar data tools
- Knowledge of TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn
- Contributions to open source projects
- Experience with microservices architecture

Our Tech Stack:
- Backend: Python 3.11, FastAPI, Django
- Databases: PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB
- Infrastructure: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform
- ML: TensorFlow, PyTorch, MLflow
- Tools: GitHub, GitHub Actions, Datadog

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and equity
- Fully remote work
- Flexible hours
- Health, dental, vision insurance
- 401(k) matching
- Unlimited PTO
- Professional development budget

We're a remote-first company with a strong engineering culture. Our team values technical excellence, collaboration, and continuous learning.

If you're passionate about building scalable AI/ML platforms and want to work with cutting-edge technologies, we'd love to hear from you!
company_info: TechCorp is a leading AI/ML platform company helping enterprises deploy machine learning at scale. Our platform processes billions of predictions daily for Fortune 500 customers. We're a team of 200+ engineers, data scientists, and ML researchers building the future of AI infrastructure.
